arm_group.description: Test Drug (Human Recombinant Epoetin alfa - Blau) dosage: 100 IU/kg intravenous administration
Eprex (Janssen-Cilag, Epoetin alfa) dosage: 100 IU/kg intravenous administration

brief_summary.textblock:
The hypothesis of this trial is that the test drug (Human Recombiant Epoetin - Blau)
      pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics parameters are similar to the comparator drug (Eprex ®
      -  Janssen-Cilag) in healthy subjects following administration of multiple intravenous dose.
      The objective of this randomized, parallel, clinical trial is to evaluate the
      pharmacokinetic and pharmacodynamic profile of the test drug Human Reconbiant Epoetin
      produced by Blau Farmacêutica, compared to the comparator drug Eprex®, produced by
      Janssen-Cilag, by assessing plasma concentration of the drug and the reticulocyte count
      following a multiple intravenous administration during 4 weeks of 100 IU/kg in healthy
      subjects.

clinical_study.brief_title: PK and PD Parallel Study After Multiple Dose, Intravenous Administration of Two Epoetin Alfa, Human Recombinant Epoetin and Eprex, in Healthy Subjects

intervention.description: Intravenous administration for 4 weeks, three times a week (monday, wednesday, friday)

clinical_study.official_title: Phase 1 Assessment of Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Two Epoetin Alfa, Human Recombinant Epoetin (Blau Farmacêutica) and Eprex (Janssen-Cilag), After Multiple Dose, Intravenous Administration in Healthy Subjects: a Randomized Parallel Study.

primary_outcome.description:
Time frame on days 1, 8, 19 and 22: -10min, 0h, 5min, 15min, 30min, 45min, 1,5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 5h, 6h, 8h, 10h and 12h after administration;
Time frame on day 26: -10min, 0h, 5min, 15min, 30min, 45min, 1,5h, 2h, 3h, 4h, 5h, 6h, 8h, 10h, 12h, 24h and 36h after last drug administration.

Time frame on days 1, 3, 5, 8, 10, 12, 15, 17, 19, 22, 24 and 26: 10 minutes before drug administration.
Time frameon day 29: 72h +/- 2h after last drug administration.
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1, 3, 5, 8, 10, 12, 15, 17, 19, 22, 24, 26 and 29 days after first administration of the drug.
